00075 class KrResource;

00084 class KrImage : public KrImNode
00085 {
00086   public:
00087         KrImage();
00088         virtual ~KrImage()      {}
00089 
00090         /*  Draw to a surface
00091                 @param surface          Target surface.
00092                 @param paintInfo        Drawing information.
00093                 @param clip                     Cliping rectangle for the surface.
00094         */
00095         virtual void Draw(      KrPaintInfo* paintInfo, const KrRect& clip, int window ) = 0;
00096 
00106         virtual void QueryBoundingBox( KrRect* boundingBox, int window ) = 0;
00107 
00158         bool CheckCollision( KrImage* other, int window = 0 );
00159 
00160         virtual KrResource* Resource() = 0;
00161 
00162         // -- Internal: -- //
00163         virtual KrImage* ToImage()                                              { return this; }
00164 
00165         virtual void    FlushInvalid( int window, bool cache );
00166         virtual void    CalcTransform( int window ) = 0;
00167 
00168         virtual void    AddedtoTree();
00169         virtual void    LeavingTree();
00170 
00171   protected:
00172         // Was the image visibile (IsVisible) at the last draw?
00173         // Used for dirty rectangle management.
00174         bool wasVisibleAtLastFlush[ KR_MAX_WINDOWS ];
00175 //      KrRect  cacheRect[ KR_MAX_WINDOWS ];
00176 //      bool    haveCacheRect[ KR_MAX_WINDOWS ];
00177 };
